org.apache.distributedlog.namespace

Interface NamespaceDriver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable

    public interface NamespaceDriver
extends Closeable
    Manager to manage all the stores required by a namespace.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  NamespaceDriver.Role

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        NamespaceDriver initialize(DistributedLogConfiguration conf,
                           org.apache.distributedlog.config.DynamicDistributedLogConfiguration dynConf,
                           URI namespace,
                           org.apache.distributedlog.util.OrderedScheduler scheduler,
                           org.apache.bookkeeper.feature.FeatureProvider featureProvider,
                           org.apache.distributedlog.injector.AsyncFailureInjector failureInjector,
                           org.apache.bookkeeper.stats.StatsLogger statsLogger,
                           org.apache.bookkeeper.stats.StatsLogger perLogStatsLogger,
                           String clientId,
                           int regionId)
                    throws IOException
        Initialize the namespace manager.
        Parameters:
        conf - distributedlog configuration
        dynConf - dynamic distributedlog configuration
        namespace - root uri of the namespace
        scheduler - ordered scheduler
        featureProvider - feature provider
        statsLogger - stats logger
        perLogStatsLogger - per log stream stats logger
        clientId - client id
        Returns:
        namespace manager
        Throws:
        IOException - when failed to initialize the namespace manager

      • getMetadataAccessor

        MetadataAccessor getMetadataAccessor(String streamName)
                              throws InvalidStreamNameException,
                                     IOException
        Retrieve the metadata accessor for log stream streamName. (TODO: it is a legacy interface. should remove it if we have metadata of stream.)
        Parameters:
        streamName - name of log stream.
        Returns:
        metadata accessor for log stream streamName.
        Throws:
        InvalidStreamNameException
